name: mernboot
description: A powerful CLI tool for generating full-stack MERN applications...
author: Theja Ashwin

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkgPath=path.join(process.env.INIT_CWD,'package.json');let pkg={name:'my-app',version:'1.0.0'};if(fs.existsSync(pkgPath)){pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath));}pkg.scripts=pkg.scripts||{};pkg.scripts.mernboot='mernboot';fs.writeFileSync(pkgPath,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));console.log('\\n\\x1b[32mâœ¨ mernboot is ready to use!\\x1b[0m\\n\\x1b[36mðŸš€ Run:\\x1b[0m\\n\\x1b[33m   npm run mernboot\\x1b[0m\\n')"
